name: A Space Monkey Run by Uber Zany
name_original: A Space Monkey Run by Uber Zany
description:
Exciting Space Runner featuring Space Monkeys Tongo, Mongo, and Jongo. Collect them all!

Imagine running along space rocks while dodging strange Creatures, huge Wasps, and fiery Asteroids. Collect coins. Grab power-up Stars to sweep up! Exciting fun and challenging.

HOW TO PLAY:

Tap the lower left of screen to jump. Collect gold coins to unlock new characters. Power-up Stars provide quick coin sweeps.

-Amazing Graphics
-Cool Sounds
-Fun Characters

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!

EXCITING FUN!!

Download ‘A Space Monkey Run’ Now!!!

PLEASE NOTE: This game is free to play but does charge real money for additional content. You may adjust your settings to lock out this function.
